title: My phone keeps restarting. How can I fix it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Make sure to power off your phone by keep your thump on power button until it goes off. now press on (vol.up) and (power) button together until you see your mobile logo then release the (power) button. Now you will be on Recovery mode. Navigate up and down by (vol.up) and (vol.down) and choose from menu Wipe factory reset, then Yes. Then choose from menu Wipe cache, then yes. From menu choose Reboot system now.

First of all take a back up of all your data. Then factory reset your phone. You can do this by holding the volume up, home and power buttons all together for some time when your phone is switched off if you are using an android phone. You will see the android logo and will be led to a page where you can factory reset, reboot or clear cache. Now click on factory reset. After doing this switch off your phone for some time and then switch it on. Your android phone will probably be back to normal.
